definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to have nothing in common with each other (idiom)
not at all the same/substantially different

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草無性系各分株的發育時間基本相同。

sentences.english: Those two girls do their hair in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個女孩把頭髮梳成相同的式樣。

sentences.english: Not all products might have the same route through the supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 並非所有產品都沿着相同的路徑通過供應鏈。

sentences.english: Gifted children can appear to have the same behaviours as those with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 天才兒童會出現一些與亞斯普傑氏症候羣相同的行爲。

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易條件與101號銷售確認書中的規定相同。

sentences.english: That is, with the same cost, a better con- trolling result can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 用相同的費用就能達到更好的控制疾病的效果。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理與家用的空氣淨化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一個新頁面都有與文書處理機相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: One Is, that both plots showed up on the same figure.
sentences.chinese: 一件事是，兩個圖都是基於相同的數據。

sentences.english: No other plug-in can share the same identifier.
sentences.chinese: 任何其他插件都不能共用相同的標識符。

sentences.english: Consider the following two versions of a method, which end up doing the same thing. The version in Listing 2 uses cached field IDs
sentences.chinese: 考慮下面兩個版本的方法，它們的作用是相同的。

sentences.english: I was level with my friend in the examination；we got the same number of marks.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友考試成績一樣，我們所得分數相同。

sentences.english: Isomers are defined as compounds having the same formula but different structures.
sentences.chinese: 異構體被定義爲化學式相同而結構不同的化合物。

sentences.english: A similar problem would occur with lifelines.
sentences.chinese: 生命線也會出現相同的問題。

sentences.english: Thirteen is much different from thirty.
sentences.chinese: 十叄和叄十是很不相同的。

sentences.english: Showing color and sky is do not hinder and identical.
sentences.chinese: 說明了色和空是不相礙而相同的。

definition: to have nothing in common with each other (idiom)
